content: For the full year 2021, we delivered total revenue of $4 billion, up 7% on a constant currency basis, Global Client revenue of $3.6 billion, up 11% on a constant currency basis, adjusted operating income margin of 16.5%, expanding 60 basis points year-over-year, and adjusted diluted earnings per share of $2.45, up 16% year-over-year.
